name: Sticky Pigeons
description:
Sticky Pigeons is a two-player versus game about trying to tip over your opponents car, that's perfectly balanced on a cliff, by throwing sticky pigeons at his/her car. The first to fall is the loser.

The game was made during a 48 hr game jam in Beirut Lebanon, where the theme was Balance.

How to play:

Press and hold the space-bar to charge-up your pigeon, release to fling your pigeon.

Depending on how long you press/hold and the wind direction as well as its power, your pigeon will either hit and stick on your opponents car, your own car, or fall which leads to having your pigeon fall on your car at a random location as a penalty.

The ideal location to hit your opponent's car is the front, stacking as many pigeons as possible to increase your chances of tipping it over.
